name: CKRecordZoneSubscription
desc: A subscription that generates push notifications when CloudKit modifies records in a specific record zone.

items.name: init(zoneID: CKRecordZone.ID)
items.desc: Creates a subscription for all records in the specified record zone.

items.name: init(zoneID: CKRecordZone.ID, subscriptionID: CKSubscription.ID)
items.desc: Creates a named subscription for all records in the specified record zone.

items.name: init(coder: NSCoder)
items.desc: Creates a zone-based subscription from a serialized instance.

items.name: var recordType: CKRecord.RecordType?
items.desc: The type of record that the subscription queries.

items.name: var zoneID: CKRecordZone.ID
items.desc: The ID of the record zone that the subscription queries.
